text: Aaron Josef Hernandez (November 6, 1989 â€“ April 19, 2017), was an American football tight end and convicted murderer. He was born in Bristol, Connecticut. He was drafted by New England Patriots in 2010. In 2013, Hernandez was indicted for first-degree murder. He was found guilty of murder in April 2015. He was sentenced to life in prison without parole. He committed suicide by hanging on April 19, 2017 in his prison cell. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Hernandez had been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American football tight ends Category:American murderers Category:American prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:Murderers who committed suicide Category:New England Patriots players Category:People from Connecticut Category:People who committed suicide in prison custody Category:People who died in prison custody in the United States Category:Suicides by hanging in the United States Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide
title: Aaron Hernandez
